test_scenarios.name: Verify Website Availability
test_scenarios.expected_result: The Vercel homepage loads successfully within an acceptable timeframe.

test_scenarios.name: Navigate to Pricing Page
steps: Click on the 'Pricing' link in the navigation bar.

test_scenarios.name: Create a New Account
steps: Enter a valid email address and password.
test_scenarios.expected_result: The user is successfully registered, redirected to the project setup page, and receives a confirmation email (if applicable).

test_scenarios.name: Login with Existing Account
steps: Enter a valid email address and password.
test_scenarios.expected_result: The user is successfully logged in and redirected to their dashboard.

test_scenarios.name: Deploy a Sample Git Repository
steps: Choose a supported Git provider (e.g., GitHub, GitLab, Bitbucket).
Connect to the Git provider if not already connected.
Select a public sample repository (e.g., vercel/nextjs-blog) from the connected Git provider.
Accept the default project settings and click 'Deploy'.
test_scenarios.expected_result: The project is successfully deployed, and a preview URL is generated.  The deployment status shows 'Success'.
